surveyor.translation[0].definitions[0].d: someone whose job is to examine the condition of a building, or to measure and record the details of an area of land
surveyor.translation[1].definitions[0].d: someone whose job involves examining the size, condition etc of buildings or land
surveyor.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Advice from a professional surveyor will prove invaluable.
The Code of Practice covers insurance brokers and chartered surveyors (=those who have passed special examinations).
